Submodules¶

qiskit_aqua.algorithms.adaptive.qaoa.qaoa module¶

class qiskit_aqua.algorithms.adaptive.qaoa.qaoa.QAOA(operator, optimizer, p=1, operator_mode='matrix', initial_point=None, batch_mode=False, aux_operators=None)[source]¶

Bases: qiskit_aqua.algorithms.adaptive.vqe.vqe.VQE

The Quantum Approximate Optimization Algorithm.

See https://arxiv.org/abs/1411.4028

CONFIGURATION = {'defaults': {'optimizer': {'name': 'COBYLA'}}, 'depends': ['optimizer'], 'description': 'Quantum Approximate Optimization Algorithm', 'input_schema': {'$schema': 'http://json-schema.org/schema#', 'id': 'qaoa_schema', 'type': 'object', 'properties': {'operator_mode': {'type': 'string', 'default': 'matrix', 'oneOf': [{'enum': ['matrix', 'paulis', 'grouped_paulis']}]}, 'p': {'type': 'integer', 'default': 1, 'minimum': 1}, 'initial_point': {'type': ['array', 'null'], 'items': {'type': 'number'}, 'default': None}, 'batch_mode': {'type': 'boolean', 'default': False}}, 'additionalProperties': False}, 'name': 'QAOA.Variational', 'problems': ['ising']}¶

__init__(operator, optimizer, p=1, operator_mode='matrix', initial_point=None, batch_mode=False, aux_operators=None)[source]¶
Parameters:
  • operator (Operator) – Qubit operator
  • operator_mode (str) – operator mode, used for eval of operator
  • p (int) – the integer parameter p as specified in https://arxiv.org/abs/1411.4028
  • optimizer (Optimizer) – the classical optimization algorithm.
  • initial_point (str) – optimizer initial point.

Checks if pluggable is ready for use. Throws an exception if not

Return pluggable configuration.

Generate the circuits.

Parameters:parameters (numpy.ndarray) – parameters for variational form.
Returns:the generated circuits with Hamiltonian.
Return type:[QuantumCircuit]
find_minimum_eigenvalue(initial_point=None)¶

Determine minimum energy state.

Parameters:initial_point (numpy.ndarray[float]) – initial point, or None if not provided.
Returns:Optimized variational parameters, and corresponding minimum eigenvalue.
Raises:ValueError
